title: Lug's Story
description: (Warning: This story contains content some readers may find offensive or disturbing.)Rebecca sits on the bus on her way home after a long day at work. Tired, she doesn't relish the short walk ahead of her when she gets off. Rebecca catches the bitter eye of Lug, a corpulent grotesque from a local sewage works. How might Becky's walk home deviate from the way she planned it?(Noncon erotic short story.)You can get it here: https://www.smashwords.com/books/view...
author: Malthus Blake
